synopsis.text: Traffic officers Natsumi and Miyuki, despite their contrasting personalities and initial disagreements, form an unstoppable duo at Bokuto Precinct in Tokyo. As they navigate the challenges of their job, they encounter a diverse array of eccentric criminals and charming fellow officers, including a man who outshines the women in beauty. From chasing down traffic violators to tackling car theft rings, these spirited policewomen bring their unique approach to maintaining law and order in this lively and captivating anime series. Join them as they turn everyday policing into extraordinary adventures, proving that upholding the law is anything but mundane.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
